availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Martha "Patsy" Froggett Boston (Green County, Kentucky, resident.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, resident. Barren County, Kentucky, resident. Married to William Boston in Barren County, Kentucky, in September 1832. Mother of Nancy J. Boston, George B. Boston, Sarah C. Boston, Mary F. Boston, Abner Boston, Amanda Boston, William Boston, and Zuinglius Boston. Resident of Green County in 1850. Resident of Green County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 1, p. 84A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 2, p. 613.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Barren County Marriages, Film 000209752.
